channel.title: CVE Feed for Uncanny Owl -- Uncanny Groups for LearnDash
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Uncanny Owl -- Uncanny Groups for LearnDash

item.title: CVE-2024-8350|2024-09-25T02:32:26.514Z -- uncanny%20owl -- uncanny%20groups%20for%20learndash
item.description: The Uncanny Groups for LearnDash plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to user group add due to a missing capability check on the /wp-json/ulgm_management/v1/add_user/ REST API endpoint in all versions up to, and including, 6.1.0.1. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with group leader-level access and above, to add users to their group which ultimately allows them to leverage CVE-2024-8349 and gain admin access to the site.

item.title: CVE-2024-8349|2024-09-25T02:32:25.610Z -- uncanny%20owl -- uncanny%20groups%20for%20learndash
item.description: The Uncanny Groups for LearnDash plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to privilege escalation in all versions up to, and including, 6.1.0.1. This is due to the plugin not properly restricting what users a group leader can edit. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with group leader-level access and above, to change admin account email addresses which can subsequently lead to admin account access.
